title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 26, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 26, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the weekend that was in sports. Has Clayton Kershaw redeemed himself in the playoffs? How would Dan have reacted if he were one of Andy Dalton's teammates? We're joined by Pro Football Talk Live Co-host Chris Simms and Dallas Morning News columnist Tim Cowlishaw. Plus, the guys share their best and worst moments from the weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
